string.name: name
string.value: Correcting the Past 4: Destroy, Destroy, Destroy!
Future Doctor Bing is looking for someone to destroy the OS3A machine that is defending the Processing Plant.
Go to the Processing Plant in the past using the #b#p9250138##k and defeat #b#o9420074#s#k, who is commanding the plant's defense.
You stopped #b#o9420074##k, who was defending the Processing Plant.
Do you remember what happened at the Processing Plant? You rode the OS3A Machine and defended the Processing Plant.
I will send you to the Processing Plant of the past using a black whole activation device.\r\nThere, you will fight the OS3A machines like the one you rode in the past.
Defeat as many machines as you can, so that the Processing Plant cannot be defended! \n\rDon't worry. The people in the machines won't be hurt.
Don't worry, the pilots won't get hurt. Now, hurry!
Everything will return to normal if we correct the past...
You made it back! Good! Thanks to you, the plant doesn't have as many people to defend it!
Still, the Processing Plant continues to operate. Please help us again tomorrow!
There are still many OS3A Machines defending the Processing Plant! Return to the past!
